Alabama.ovrRequirements: an Alabama driver's license or state ID

Alaska.ovrRequirements: an Alaska driver's license or state ID

Arizona.ovrRequirements: an Arizona driver's license or state ID

Colorado.ovrRequirements: a Social Security Number or a Colorado driver's license or state ID

Connecticut.ovrRequirements: a Connecticut driver's license or state ID

Delaware.ovrRequirements: a Delaware driver's license or state ID

Florida.ovrRequirements: a Florida driver's license or state ID

Georgia.ovrRequirements: a Georgia driver's license or state ID
Georgia.ovrNotes: Then click "I Want to Register to Vote!"

Hawaii.ovrRequirements: a Hawaii driver's license or state ID

Idaho.ovrRequirements: an Idaho driver's license or state ID

Illinois.ovrRequirements: an Illinois driver's license or state ID

Indiana.ovrRequirements: an Indiana driver's license or state ID

Iowa.ovrRequirements: an Iowa driver's license or state ID
Iowa.ovrNotes: Then scroll down to the form.

Kansas.ovrRequirements: a Kansas driver's license or state ID

Louisiana.ovrRequirements: a Louisiana driver's license or state ID

Maryland.ovrRequirements: a Maryland driver's license, learner's permit, or state ID

Massachusetts.ovrRequirements: an ID issued by the Massachusetts Registry of Motor Vehicles

Michigan.ovrRequirements: a Michigan driver's license or state ID

Minnesota.ovrRequirements: a Minnesota driver's license and state ID, and an email address
Minnesota.ovrNotes: Then scroll down to view the form.

Missouri.ovrRequirements: a phone, tablet, or other touchscreen device so you can sign your form on your screen

Nebraska.ovrRequirements: a Nebraska driver's license or state ID

Nevada.ovrRequirements: a Nevada driver's license or state ID

New Hampshire.specialInstructions: New Hampshire allows you to register when you vote on election day. Or, you can register in person with your town clerk beforehand, but you can't register online or by mail.

New Jersey.ovrRequirements: a New Jersey driver's license or state ID; or a phone, tablet, or other touchscreen to sign on your screen; or the ability to upload a photo of your signature

New Mexico.ovrRequirements: a New Mexico driver's license or state ID

New York.ovrRequirements: a New York driver's license, permit, or state ID

North Carolina.ovrRequirements: a North Carolina driver's license or DMV-issued ID number
North Carolina.ovrNotes: Then, at the bottom of the page, click "Continue as a guest" if you don't want to create an account. Then click "Submit a Voter Registration Application".

North Dakota.specialInstructions: North Dakota does not require you to register before voting.

Ohio.ovrRequirements: an Ohio driver's license or state ID
Ohio.ovrNotes: Then scroll down and click "Let's Get Started".

Oregon.ovrRequirements: an Oregon driver's license or state ID

Pennsylvania.ovrRequirements: a Pennsylvania driver's license or PennDOT ID card number, or the ability to take a photo of your signature and upload it

Rhode Island.ovrRequirements: a Rhode Island driver's license or state ID

South Carolina.ovrRequirements: a South Carolina driver's license or state ID

Tennessee.ovrRequirements: a Tennessee driver's license or Tennessee Department of Safety and Homeland Security ID

Utah.ovrRequirements: a Utah driver's license or state ID

Virginia.ovrRequirements: a Virginia driver's license or state ID

Washington.ovrRequirements: a Washington driver's license or state ID

West Virginia.ovrRequirements: a West Virginia driver's license, permit, or state ID

Wisconsin.ovrRequirements: a Wisconsin driver's license or state ID

Wyoming.specialInstructions: Wyoming law does not allow you to use this tool to register to vote. To learn more about registering to vote in Wyoming, please contact the county clerk where you live. Contact information can be found at http://soswy.state.wy.us/Elections/RegisteringToVote.aspx or by calling 307-777-3573.
